name: Son of Nor - The World is Your Weapon
blurb: A singleplayer and co-op action adventure game set in a dynamic desert world, which can be shaped by the player's magic.

rewards.reward: No Reward

CREDITED!\r\n=============================\r\nYou have our gratitude. Forever. And you get to be in the "Thank You" section of the game's credits! With this reward you also receive a Son of Nor Wallpaper and access to the Backer's Forum.

PLAY EDITION - EARLY BIRD
=============================
For a lower price, you get a digital copy of Son of Nor for Windows, Mac or Linux, including a digital copy of the manual. This game is DRM Free! Get one before they run out!
=============================
Also Includes: Mention in the credits + Wallpaper + Access to Backer's Forum.

PLAY EDITION
=============================
You get a digital copy of Son of Nor for Windows, Mac or Linux, including a digital copy of the manual. This game is DRM Free!
=============================
Also Includes: Mention in the credits + Wallpaper + Access to Backer's Forum.

PLAY & LISTEN EDITION
=============================
You get a downloadable soundtrack with the music from Son of Nor ready to be put in the device of your choice
=============================
Also Includes: Mention in the credits + Wallpaper + Access to Backer's Forum + Digital copy of Son of Nor.

THE IMPATIENT ONE
=============================
Be the first one to try the game by getting closed beta access! Also get a Defender of Memnis Honor Badge in the multiplayer lobby for kickstarter backers only!
=============================
Also Includes: Mention in the credits + Wallpaper + Access to Backer's Forum + Digital copy of Son of Nor + Digital Soundtrack.

CO-OP EDITION ============================= You get TWO digital copies of Son of Nor for Windows, Mac or Linux, including a digital copy of the manual. This game is DRM Free! ============================= Also Includes: Mention in the credits + Wallpaper + Access to Backer's Forum + Digital Version of the Soundtrack.

THE BOXED ONE
=============================
Like the smell of new games when you open them? Us too! You get a physical boxed version of Son of Nor. Enjoy!
=============================
Also Includes: Mention in the credits + Wallpaper + Access to Backer's Forum + Digital copy of Son of Nor (Same Key as the Physical Version) + Digital Soundtrack + Closed Beta Access + Defender of Memnis Honor Badge for Multiplayer Lobby.
=============================
(We'll send everything that this reward includes with the exception of the items forbidden by your country of residence.)

DIGITAL COLLECTOR'S CO-OP EDITION - EARLY BIRD
=============================
For a lower price, get your digital copy of The Bible of Nor, filled with lore and concept art. Also get an ADDITIONAL copy of the game and a special in-game Moon's Touch Bracer.
=============================
Also Includes: Mention in the credits + Wallpaper + Access to Backer's Forum + Digital copy of Son of Nor + Digital Soundtrack + Closed Beta Access + Defender of Memnis Honor Badge for Multiplayer Lobby.

DIGITAL COLLECTOR'S CO-OP EDITION
=============================
Get your digital copy of The Bible of Nor, filled with lore and concept art. Also get an ADDITIONAL copy of the game and a special in-game Moon's Touch Bracer.
=============================
Also Includes: Mention in the credits + Wallpaper + Access to Backer's Forum + Digital copy of Son of Nor + Digital Soundtrack + Closed Beta Access + Defender of Memnis Honor Badge for Multiplayer Lobby.

BIG PARTY CO-OP EDITION ============================= You get 4 digital copies of Son of Nor for Windows, Mac or Linux. This allows you to get the ultimate co-op experience in one package! A digital copy of the manual is included too. ============================= Also Includes: Mention in the credits + Wallpaper + Access to Backer's Forum.

WALL OF HEROES
=============================
Get immortalized in-game by putting your name on the Wall of Heroes of the ruined ghost city of Quil (your name will also appear in the Bible of Nor). Plus a T-Shirt!
=============================
Also Includes: Wallpaper + Access to Backer's Forum + 2 Digital copies of Son of Nor + Digital Soundtrack + Closed Beta Access + Defender of Memnis Honor Badge for Multiplayer Lobby + Digital Bible of Nor + (in-game) Moon's Touch Bracer + Mention in credits as Hero of The Great War.

SHIRTLESS FALLEN HERO ============================= Be immortalized as the one who defended mankind during The Great War (your name will also appear in the Bible of Nor). You will get your own tombstone at the graveyard of the ruined ghost city Quil with your name on it. (Same as $120 Reward but without the T-shirt) ============================= Also Includes: Wallpaper + Access to Backer's Forum + 2 Digital copies of Son of Nor + Digital Soundtrack + Closed Beta Access + Defender of Memnis Honor Badge for Multiplayer Lobby + Digital Bible of Nor + (in-game) Moon's Touch Bracer + Mention in credits as Hero of The Great War.

FALLEN HERO REMEMBRANCE
=============================
Be immortalized as the one who defended mankind during The Great War (your name will also appear in the Bible of Nor). You will get your own tombstone at the graveyard of the ruined ghost city Quil with your name on it. 
=============================
Also Includes: Wallpaper + Access to Backer's Forum + 2 Digital copies of Son of Nor + Digital Soundtrack + Closed Beta Access + Defender of Memnis Honor Badge for Multiplayer Lobby + Digital Bible of Nor + (in-game) Moon's Touch Bracer + Mention in credits as Hero of The Great War + T-Shirt.

EXCLUSIVE PHYSICAL COLLECTOR'S EDITION
=============================
Get a special physical collector's edition game box which comes with the physical game DVD, a medallion of the symbol of Nor, the physical soundtrack, the map of Noshrac and a physical Bible of Nor.
=============================
Also Includes: Wallpaper + Access to Backer's Forum + 2 Digital copies of Son of Nor (One Has the Same Key as the Physical Version) + Digital Soundtrack + Closed Beta Access + Defender of Memnis Honor Badge for Multiplayer Lobby + Digital Bible of Nor + (in-game) Moon's Touch Bracer + (in-game) Your Name on the Wall of Heroes + Mention in credits as Hero of The Great War + T-Shirt.
=============================
(We'll send everything that this reward includes with the exception of the items forbidden by your country of residence.)

IMMERSIVE EDITION
============================= 
You get a digital copy of Son of Nor bundled with a special Emotiv EPOC headgear (brain-computer-interface), including a digital copy of the manual. Unleash the full power of your brain by casting magic with your thoughts for a truly immersive playing-experience.
============================= 
Also Includes: Mention in the credits + Wallpaper + Access to Backer's Forum.
============================= 
(We'll send everything that this reward includes with the exception of the items forbidden by your country of residence.)
(The EPOC headgear currently supports Windows and Mac.)

INFLUENCER
=============================
Get to know us! Participate in a exclusive private video conference with the stillalive studios dev team. Talk about whatever you like, get to know the developers personally, obtain behind the scenes stories, anything you want!
=============================
Also Includes: Everything Inside the Exclusive Physical Collector's Edition + Wallpaper + Access to Backer's Forum + 2 Digital copies of Son of Nor (One Has the Same Key as the Physical Version) + Digital Soundtrack + Closed Beta Access + Defender of Memnis Honor Badge for Multiplayer Lobby + Digital Bible of Nor + (in-game) Moon's Touch Bracer + (in-game) Your Name on the Wall of Heroes + Mention in credits as Hero of The Great War + T-Shirt.
=============================
(We'll send everything that this reward includes with the exception of the items forbidden by your country of residence.)

IMMERSIVE PHYSICAL COLLECTOR’S EDITION
============================= 
Get a special immersive physical collector's edition game box which comes with the physical game DVD, a medallion of the symbol of Nor, the physical soundtrack, the map of Noshrac, a physical Bible of Nor and a special Emotiv EPOC headgear (brain-computer-interface)! Unleash the full power of your brain by casting magic with your thoughts for a truly immersive playing-experience.
============================= 
Also Includes: Wallpaper + Access to Backer's Forum + 2 Digital copies of Son of Nor (One Has the Same Key as the Physical Version) + Digital Soundtrack + Closed Beta Access + Defender of Memnis Honor Badge for Multiplayer Lobby + Digital Bible of Nor + (in-game) Moon's Touch Bracer + (in-game) Your Name on the Wall of Heroes + Mention in credits as Hero of The Great War + T-Shirt. 
============================= 
(We'll send everything that this reward includes with the exception of the items forbidden by your country of residence.)
(The EPOC headgear currently supports Windows and Mac.)

$25 shipping

BECOME AN NPC
=============================
Name and help design one of the Non-Playable Characters that will appear in the game, including their dialogue!
=============================
Also Includes: Everything Inside the Exclusive Physical Collector's Edition + Wallpaper + Access to Backer's Forum + 2 Digital copies of Son of Nor (One Has the Same Key as the Physical Version) + Digital Soundtrack + Closed Beta Access + Defender of Memnis Honor Badge for Multiplayer Lobby + Digital Bible of Nor + (in-game) Moon's Touch Bracer + (in-game) Your Name on the Wall of Heroes + Mention in credits as Hero of The Great War + T-Shirt.
=============================
(We'll send everything that this reward includes with the exception of the items forbidden by your country of residence.)
=============================
(The creation of in-game assets must be within the boundaries and logic of our fantasy world.)

DIVINE IMAGE
=============================
Be canonized as an important saint of the Path of Nor. Your divine image will be displayed in every Radir (Nor's Church) found in the game.
=============================
Also Includes: Everything Inside the Exclusive Physical Collector's Edition + Wallpaper + Access to Backer's Forum + 2 Digital copies of Son of Nor (One Has the Same Key as the Physical Version) + Digital Soundtrack + Closed Beta Access + Defender of Memnis Honor Badge for Multiplayer Lobby + Digital Bible of Nor + (in-game) Moon's Touch Bracer + (in-game) Your Name on the Wall of Heroes + Mention credits as Hero of The Great War + T-Shirt.
=============================
(We'll send everything that this reward includes with the exception of the items forbidden by your country of residence.)
=============================
(The creation of in-game assets must be within the boundaries and logic of our fantasy world.)

PLAY AS YOURSELF
=============================
Become a playable character! Talk to our concept artist and describe how you want your character to look like. Also, choose if you want this character to be exclusive to you or to be included in the playable character's roster for everybody.
=============================
Also Includes: Everything Inside the Exclusive Physical Collector's Edition + Wallpaper + Access to Backer's Forum + 4 Digital copies of Son of Nor (One Has the Same Key as the Physical Version) + Digital Soundtrack + Closed Beta Access + Defender of Memnis Honor Badge for Multiplayer Lobby + Digital Bible of Nor + (in-game) Moon's Touch Bracer + (in-game) Your Name on the Wall of Heroes + Mention in the game credits as Hero of The Great War + T-Shirt.
=============================
(We'll send everything that this reward includes with the exception of the items forbidden by your country of residence.)
=============================
(The creation of in-game assets must be within the boundaries and logic of our fantasy world.)

THE ARCHITECT
=============================
Create and design a puzzle for the game that everybody will have to solve. Be remembered forever for your intellect when people see in-game who created the puzzle. Also you'll be mentioned in the Bible of Nor and credited in the game credits as Puzzle Master!
=============================
Also Includes: Everything Inside the Exclusive Physical Collector's Edition + Wallpaper + Access to Backer's Forum + 4 Digital copies of Son of Nor (One Has the Same Key as the Physical Version) + Digital Soundtrack + Closed Beta Access + Defender of Memnis Honor Badge for Multiplayer Lobby + Digital Bible of Nor + (in-game) Moon's Touch Bracer + (in-game) Your Name on the Wall of Heroes + Mention in the game credits as Puzzle Master + T-Shirt.
=============================
(We'll send everything that this reward includes with the exception of the items forbidden by your country of residence.)
=============================
(The creation of in-game assets must be within the boundaries and logic of our fantasy world.)

FUN WITH TEMPLES AND SKIIS
=============================
Spend your holidays skiing with Chris and Julian in Innsbruck! (3 nights in a hotel + transfer from Munich or Innsbruck airport included). Also, name one of the 3 Forgotten temples that the player visits in the game and help design the statue that is placed at its entrance!
=============================
Also Includes: Everything Inside the Exclusive Physical Collector's Edition + Wallpaper + Access to Backer's Forum + 4 Digital copies of Son of Nor (One Has the Same Key as the Physical Version) + Digital Soundtrack + Closed Beta Access + Defender of Memnis Honor Badge for Multiplayer Lobby + Digital Bible of Nor + (in-game) Moon's Touch Bracer + (in-game) Your Name on the Wall of Heroes + Mention in credits as Temple Owner + T-Shirt.
=============================
(We'll send everything that this reward includes with the exception of the items forbidden by your country of residence.)
=============================
(The creation of in-game assets must be within the boundaries and logic of our fantasy world.)
